transcript:
Customer: Hello.

Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ji, Shrinivas Elma baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se. Aapka call aaya tha hamare paas IndiaMART se.
Customer: Ha, kaun bol raha hai?
Executive: Ji, Elma baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se. Aap account manager. Maine aapko main Moon Goyal ko phone kiya tha.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: To nahi mera phone uthaya. Wo actually wo expert assistant hai. Expert assistant to phone hi kyun aisa hota hai jo uthata nahi hai ya fir busy hota hai to main samajh sakta hu. To kal kyun phone nahi aaya unka?
Executive: To actually Moon company ke saath ab nahi hai. Thik hai, kal hi hame pata chala wo system mein nahi hai ab. Main aapko ek dusra account manager assign karti hu. Thik hai. Mere yaha pe jo number tha na IndiaMART ke jo site mujhe di hui hai na, uske andar uska hi number hai, uska personal number bhi. Haan sir, tab tak kal tak, haan kal tak the sir wo. But ab unhone company chhod di hai. To aap mujhe thoda sa time dijiye. Main bolti hu dusre account manager se wo aapko call karte hai aur aapse discuss karte hai sir. Thik hai?
Customer: Ha, main aapka number bhi mera nikal gaya tha. Warna main aapse hi kal baat karta. Ye kya naam bataya aapne?
Executive: Elma.
Customer: Elma. Elma sir, ji. Main ek baar account manager se. Ye ye agar baat karni hai to yahi number aapka hai?
Executive: Uh, sir ye to mera dekhiye ye IndiaMART ke via through call hai sir. C to C call hai ye IndiaMART ka. Main ek baar aapko account manager se bolti hu aapko direct call kare sir. Thik hai? Yaha par ticket open ho gayi hai sir.
Customer: Thik hai, koi baat nahi. Ek cheez mere ko abhi main aapse baat kar leta hu. Actually kal kisi bache ka aapke waha se phone aaya tha. Suno.
Executive: Thik hai.
Customer: Kal aapke waha pe ek bande ka phone aaya tha. Maine aapko bataya tha ki yaar November end ya December end ko aap apna renewal ka jo bhi offer hai mere ko de dena, thik hai?
Executive: Ji. Thik hai.
Customer: Haan, to ye meri baat aapse ho chuki thi aur usse bhi ho chuki thi, Moon se bhi ho chuki thi. To kal aake meri message daba raha tha wo banda. To pehle to ye mat. Shah ji se aapki baat hui thi na?
Customer: Are jo bhi ho, mere ko us bande se baat hi nahi karni hai. Dekho ek cheez samjho main maine maine unko seedha tha ek seedha hindi mein bola, spasht bola. Bhaiya aapka jo bhi ho November end ya December first week. Aap mujhe aapka jo bhi offer ho mere ko de dena. Maine kabhi unko aisa nahi bola kya discount dena hai. Dena nahi dena wo aapke upar hai. Mere ko renew karna hai nahi karta wo mere upar hai. Thik hai?
Executive: Ji sir, ji.
Customer: To baar baar mere ko aapka ye benefit hai, wo benefit hai, bhav badh gaya hai. Dekho bhav badh gaya hai kuch bhi karo lakh nahi 15 lakh kar do. Mere ko koi dikkat nahi hai. Pehli cheez ye hai ki aapki company ka sabse worst hai ki aapka koi expert assistant rehta hi nahi hai. Nikal jata hai. Kyun?
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Baar baar kyun change hota hai?
Executive: Sir, unfortunately aisa ho but ab jo main aapko assign karungi. Nahi nahi wo mera aisa nahi ye abhi abhi last abhi che saat mahine mein hi aisa hua hai. Do teen badal chuke hai. To aisa kyun? To mera company ke andar kuch fault hai. Hmm. Kyunki wo banda nahi tikta hai to matlab company mein fault hai ya bande mein fault hai?
Executive: Sir wo actually. Humko to humko to yahi lagega na. Elma ji Elma ji aap samjhiye. Humko to yahi lagega na. Achcha che mahina koi rehta hai nahi tikta hai to hum samajh sakte hai. Aur kisi ke saath repo create karne ke liye kuch time to chahiye.
Executive: Bilkul sir, exactly.
Customer: Ya. To wo wo cheez hoti hai na to wo galat baat hai. Dusri cheez dekho maine aapko bataya main mana nahi kar raha hu, thik hai. Main aapka wo bhi dekhunga isliye main November end ko aap aapka jo bhi hai mere ko batana. Mere ko kya fayda hai kya nahi fayda wo main ab bakhoobi main nikal leta hu. Wo chinta mat karo aap. Hmm. Thik hai? Aap apne taraf se 10 saal purana client aapka hai. Aapko kya dena nahi dena jo bhi dena hai wo aapke upar hai. Main aisa mana nahi karta hu mere ko itna chahiye ye chahiye wo chahiye. Main nahi kahunga abhi. Hmm, ji sir.
Customer: Ek yaha pe to 80,000 likha hua hi hai. Do saal ka. To mere ko jo bhi ek saal ka ho, do saal ka ho, teen saal ka ho, teeno teen ka base dena mere ko pata chalega.
Executive: Thik hai. Thik hai. Kitni lead hai kya hai sab mere ko mail mein chahiye. Suno suno sab mere ko mail mein chahiye. Verbally kuch nahi chahiye. Haan hum mail hi pe share karte hai sari cheeze sir.
Customer: Thik hai, jo final figure hoga wahi mere ko dena. Iske andar fir negotiable karna nahi hai aisa nahi hai. Main yahi soch ke main ye karunga aage decision lunga ki mere ko IndiaMART mein jana hai, Trade India mein jana hai, Export India mein jana hai. Baki baki aur jagah bhi hai. Abhi main abhi bhale 10 saal se aapke waha pe tha. Abhi aapke upar jayega ki aapko kya karna kya nahi karna. Thik hai?
Executive: Thik hai.
Customer: Jaise humko hamara client ki chinta hoti hai. Agar hum proposal mein aapko bheje to matlab proposal isiliye na ki haan hame final karna hai. Ab aisa to nahi uske baad. Haan proposal karna hai par ek cheez suno suno ek cheez suno. Proposal karna hai final karna hai to aap jo bhi final karna hai main jaise kisi bande ko apna rate deta hu. To main aisa to nahi bolunga na ki bhai maine rate de diya final le liya ab aap le hi lo. Never. Wo bande ke upar hai. Aap samjho Elma ji. But sir aap kahin dukaan mein jaate ho, aap kahin suno suno aap kahin dukaan pe jaate ho aur kuch sari ya dress lete ho to banda rate aapko deta hai aap dekhte ho sab dekhte ho uske baad bolta hai rate de diya abhi aapko lena hi padega. Aisa to nahi hona chahiye na?
Executive: Nahi nahi sir. Dekhiye wo cheez ek alag cheez ho gayi but aap hamare saath hai to matlab agar aap humse price mang rahe ho. Main mana nahi kar raha hu main aapke saath hi mere ko main aapke saath hi hu to bas tab tak saath hu ke mere ko kya benefit rahega wo bhi main dekhunga na meri company ka to main dekhunga Elma ji aap samjhiye. Ji. Mujhe kahin aur benefit achcha mil raha hai to main jaunga na. Main abhi tak main nahi soch raha tha. Main barso se Trade India mere peeche pada hua tha. Kyunki 2000 jab se shuru kiya na aapke tab se wo Trade India tha par pehle mahine mein kuch dikkat aayi unse to fir maine kaat hi diya pura. 10 saal tak usko haath nahi rakhne diya. Hmm. Kyunki IndiaMART ka mujhe malum hai. Kaam kya hai par last wo wo sab dekhta hu na to mere ko aisa lagta hai ki company mein kuch to gadbadi chal rahi hai. Uska share share ka bhav toot raha hai. Aisa bilkul bhi nahi hai. Kyunki mujhe mujhe malum hai uska share bhi mere paas hai aap aap nahi mante ho IndiaMART ke share mere paas hai. Maine purchase kiya hua hai. Main aapko ye bol sakti hu sir ki mere paas aapka account hai main assigned hu. To aap achche hi haath mein sir aapka account hai ab aap kabhi bhi call karoge kuch bhi rahega personally aapka issue resolve nahi karenge ya. Main main mana nahi kar raha hu aap bahut achchi hai aap apne kaam se wafadar hai aap sahi dhang se kaam karte hai mere ko aapse koi complaint nahi hai, thik hai. Par ek cheez samjho aapki jo offer IndiaMART de raha hai koi other company usse achcha offer degi to aap chali jaogi na. Bilkul sir wo to chale jayenge. Wo main main wahi main wahi main wahi bol raha hu main wahi bol raha hu main aisa nahi bol raha hu ki IndiaMART pe hum log kya karte hai sir madam ek baat samajh lijiye kisi bhi company ka kuch bhi mere ko agar chahiye ki kaisi company chal rahi hai to uska hum data dekh lete hai. Hmm. Uske baad hi hum jaise share market mein kaam hamara hota hai to uske baad hi hum log invest karte hai. Sir uska pura details de denge IndiaMART wo us hisab se. Haan wo wo isiliye hum log pata chalta hai na ki bhai company kaisi hai kya growth kar rahi hai kaise kar rahi hai uske upar hi to but ye IndiaMART karega na aapko ki aapko business aa raha hai ki nahi IndiaMART se agar wo aa raha hai ya aapko nahi aa raha hai mera mera abhi aap nahi manoge nahi manoge Trade India se abhi mera peeche itne sare direct call aaye na Trade India se aaya. Main Google se aaye Trade India se aaye sab mein se aaye. Ji. Ki mera sab jagah pe chalta hai aisa nahi hai ki maine nahi kiya hai. Par hum log yahi karte hai direct call aate hai to hum seedha unko pooch lete hai. Ki bhai kaha se mera reference mila to wo party bolti hai IndiaMART se hai Trade India se IndiaMART ka hota hai to humko pata chal jata hai ki wo to IndiaMART se call sahi aata hai wo to pata chal dusri cheez kya hai yaha pe bolta hu to pata chal jata hai. Ji. To ye cheeze mere ko koi nahi hai mere ko aap jo bhi ho offer aapka ye November end ye mahine ke end mein last week mein mere ko aap de dena main us hisab se calculate karke uske baad main set karunga aage. Barobar last last ye November end tak de dena aap fir kya bolte hai usko last week mein hi. Aap de dena phone mat karna. aapko mail pe share kar denge main abhi is month ka hi price aapko share kar deta hu. Nahi wo nahi nahi is month is month is month is month kya nahi main kya bolna hu ki dekho aap mere ko aaj karoge thik hai to fir aap bologe ki 30 November tak hi ye hai main aisa bol raha hu mera main dekho mera 31 December ko last date hai thik hai main 20 21 tarikh ko 31 December ko main bhar sakta hu usse pehle nahi bharunga. Wo confirm. 31 December hi mein. Usse pehle haan mere ko agar November end tak mere ko pata chal jata hai ki bhai itna itna hai to mere ko pata chalta hai to main thik hai main usse pehle bhi bhar sakta hu agar aapka offer kam aaya fir aisa na ho ki aapne mere ko offer diya fir bologe ki nahi ye to November 30 November tak hi tha abhi December ka alag aata hai waise mat karna main aapko spasht bol raha hu. Chaliye. Jo bhi aapka offer hoga nahi nahi suno aapke waha se jo bhi offer hoga dekho aapke waha se offer change hota rehta hai. Main aisa nahi bol raha hu thik hai change hota rehta hai. To main wahi bol raha hu ki meri ginti 31 December ka hai usse pehle 20 21 December ko main direct main one shot mein karunga aapka ek saal ka bhi dena do saal ka bhi dena teen saal ka bhi dena TrustSeal ka. Jo bhi hai thik hai? Thik hai. Thik hai sir. Haan are are jaise aapka Elma ji. Ji. Elma ji aap mere ko call karogi iske bare mein koi wo karega. Main hi connect karungi. Okay sir. Haan thik hai aur aapka jo manager se aapko connect karna hai ya fir aapko connect karna hai. Haan connect karwa do kaun hai aur dusri cheez meri jo site pe hai na uska Moon Goyal ka wo details nikal do aap. Sir wo hat jayega do teen din mein wo process ho jayega. Thik hai abhi unka kya naam hai? Jo naye naye jo assign karna hai aap mujhe batao to main assign karke aapko karwati hu. Nahi nahi koi baat nahi unko unko usi ke number se karwao kyunki wo number bhi mere ko chahiye mere ko baat karni hai wo kabhi bhi jaise maine kal baat karni thi to isiliye haan. Thik hai. Thik hai sir main karwati hu. Ha. Ha yaha pe ticket open main close kar deti hu sir aap CLM yes kar dijiyega thik hai aur main aapko month end tak bhejti hu. Thik hai? Alright. Thik hai thik hai. Thank you. Okay thank you. Thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Why Moon Goyal didn't answer the call.

- Expert assistant keeps changing.

- Wants renewal offer by November end or December.

- Wants details of leads and offers in mail.

- Wants Moon Goyal's details removed from site.



Resolution:

- Informed Moon Goyal is no longer with company.

- Assured a new account manager will be assigned.

- Assured to provide renewal offer by month end.

- Agreed to remove Moon Goyal's details.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will send the offer by month end.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- account manager, renewal, offer, leads, details
